catalyst: The catalyst used in the experiment is Ag/CTO samples, with the Ag cocatalyst loading amount being 0.1 or 0.5 wt%.
co_catalyst: The co-catalyst used in the experiment is Ag (silver).
reaction medium: The reaction medium used in the experiment was a gas-liquid-solid three-phase system. Specifically, the photocatalytic reactions were carried out in a quartz cell containing 0.2 g of the photocatalyst powder dispersed in 10 mL of water saturated with 11 mmol of NaHCO3, under a flow of CO2 gas.
reactor type: The reactor type for the experiment is a gas-liquid-solid three-phase reactor.
